title: The most important interpretations of pregnancy in a dream according to some jurists

preview.html: Pregnancy in a dream and the importance of its interpretations. The feeling of motherhood is the most beautiful feeling in the world. A girl tries to get married until she becomes pregnant and a fetus is formed inside her womb and becomes a mother after the birth of this fetus, but the situation in dreams is somewhat different from reality. Because pregnancy in a dream has many different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy: If a man sees that he is pregnant in a dream, this means that he is suffering from many problems in his life, and these problems have exhausted him physically and psychologically. Ibn Sirin explains a man’s pregnancy because this man does many things that no one wants Knowing anything about her. If a single person sees that she is pregnant, this is evidence that he is living a miserable life, and wants to get rid of it, but he has not succeeded. If an unmarried woman dreams that her mother is pregnant, knowing that this mother is old, this means that this mother She suffers from a serious illness that makes her bedridden for the same number of months of pregnancy. If an unmarried fiancée dreams that she got married and became pregnant and was happy, this means that God will make her happy with her husband and they will face problems at the beginning of their lives, but she will overcome them without any judgement. Pregnancy and childbirth in a dream If most interpretations of pregnancy In a dream, it is unpleasant and indicates problems and difficulties that a person will face in his later life, the interpretation of childbirth is exactly the opposite. If the child is a woman, this is a sign of the beautiful life that the fortuneteller will live. When an unmarried woman sees that she is giving birth and the birth was easy and affordable, God will grant that the life of that unmarried woman turns from sorrow and grief to happiness and joy, and if she searches for what suits her. A life partner, you will find him, and if he wants money and work, he will work and get money. But if a girl sees in her dream that she is giving birth and that the birth was very difficult, then this is evidence of the number of psychological problems she suffers from and because of them she complains of negative energy, but God will save her soon. Problems. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Pregnancy in a dream for a single woman. When an unmarried woman sees that she is pregnant, this is a sign of the difficulties she will face in the coming days, especially if she is tired in the dream. If an unmarried suitor sees in her dream that she is pregnant, this indicates annulment of the engagement. But if the unmarried woman actually goes to a job, and sees in her dream that she is pregnant, then this vision is a warning from God not to go to this job. Because it will make you tired and cause you a lot of problems. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant and her family tries to hide her from people’s eyes, this is evidence that she will do something that will affect her biography or honor, and this matter will harm all family members. Pregnancy in a dream for a married woman By Imam Al-Sadiq: If a married woman dreams that she is pregnant, this means that her husband will face problems at work, and these problems will lead to many financial crises in her home. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth and the birth was difficult, this is evidence that

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a non-mine child in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child who is not my child Breastfeeding is a natural instinct that God has implanted in every mother, and it means the release of milk from the breast to nourish the child in the first months of his life or even in the first years until his body is complete and capable. To eat food naturally and separately, but what about the interpretation of seeing a child breastfeeding a child in a dream? We find that this vision arouses the dreamer’s curiosity about its meaning, especially if it relates to a single person, a man, or a widow. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child other than my own. The interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child other than my own is related to the dreamer’s gender. Is he single, married or divorced? It could be a man, so we find many different meanings, such as: The interpretation of the dream that I am breastfeeding a child who is not my son shows the good biography and reputation of the good married dreamer among the people. Seeing a divorced woman breastfeeding a child other than her own in a dream is good news that worries and problems will disappear and relief will come after Distress and anguish. A dream about caring for a strange child for a sick person is a sign of his recovery, the nearness of recovery and the restoration of good health after being bedridden. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child who is not my child according to Ibn Sirin, in the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child who is not my child, various connotations, such as: Interpret Ibn Sirin sees a woman who is late in giving birth breastfeeding a strange child in her dream as good news, such as the imminent appearance of pregnancy and the provision of healthy offspring. Ibn Sirin sees in the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a strange child in the dreamer’s dream that it is not from her womb, a warning of worries, problems, and a financial burden. Whoever sees in her dream that she stumbles while breastfeeding a child and some milk comes out of her, may be exposed to a health or moral crisis. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child other than my own: It is not unusual for a single woman to breastfeed, so what about seeing her breastfeeding a strange child during her sleep? Scientists differed in answering this question. Some of them believe that it is a good vision, while others believe the opposite: Seeing an unmarried woman breastfeeding a strange child in her dream, and she is a woman, is a sign of purity of soul, kindness of heart, and good treatment of others. The interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child indicates Without children for an unmarried woman to a close marriage with a good man of good morals and religion. While if a girl sees that she is breastfeeding a male child, this may portend problems in her life and she may suffer from anxiety and distress. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a non-children from the left breast of an unmarried woman in Interpreting a dream about a child who does not feed a single child from the left breast, scholars cite various connotations, such as: It has been said that the interpretation of a dream about a non-infant feeding a child from the left breast for an unmarried woman is an indication of her need for emotional attention and sharing the feeling of love. Jurists consider that the interpretation of watching A girl breastfeeding a baby girl from her left breast is better than breastfeeding a strange child, as it can portend distress and distress, while for a female it is a harbinger of a full life. Of joy and happiness. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child other than my own for a married woman. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair cream in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing hair cream in a dream: Seeing a person dreams of buying hair cream in a dream, and this indicates income, nutrition, and freedom from obstacles and worries. Likewise, the generous hair in it indicates the good reputation that the dreamer enjoys and his success and excellence in many fields. Dyeing the hair with cream in the dream indicates that The dreamer will get rid of all the worries and problems he faces and his outlook on life in a positive spirit. Also, seeing hair cream in a dream means that the young man will enter a new job and his profession will be hairdressing and he will earn his earnings. Interpretation of a dream about hair cream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is applying hair cream, This indicates that she cares greatly about her appearance and that she takes good care of herself. Likewise, seeing beautiful, clean hair and applying hair cream to it indicates that an unmarried girl’s husband is close to the man she loves. Also, seeing dirty hair of an unmarried person indicates a lack of interest and self-confidence, as well as indicating Her failure. Interpretation of seeing hair cream in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself applying hair cream, this indicates her intense love and devotion to her husband and brings him good. Also, the interpretation of seeing hair cream in a dream for a married woman shows the achievement of her goals and her great ambition in raising her children. Her vision. She removes her hair in a dream, which indicates many worries and differences between her and her husband and the end of the marital relationship, and God knows best. And when a woman sees in her dream that she is combing her hair, this indicates the removal of problems and worries and her happy life. Interpretation of seeing hair cream in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream If she sees herself combing her hair and looking at her beauty, this indicates that her and her husband’s affairs will ease, God willing. Interpretation of seeing hair cream in a dream for a man: If a man dreams of applying hair cream on his daughter, this indicates He has great love for his children and also shows that he has a lot of nourishment. Also, seeing the shawl cream of a single man wearing it shows his marriage to a good girl who has lost her Lord. Also, the hair cream in a dream and the shine of the hair indicate the happiness and pleasure that he will find in his life and obtaining a job. Interpretation of dreams With a piece of hair, I throw it away. A piece of hair in a dream expresses the dreamer’s lust and temptations, which he cannot control, and it may also indicate his health. If a woman sees in her dream that a lock of hair is falling out, this indicates her disobedience to her Lord in matters of her religion and the many sins that she commits. Vision Buying hair cream in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a dream about buying hair cream is evidence that the dreamer will get rid of people who envy him. Also, seeing hair cream being thrown away in a dream means that the dreamer is suffering from some psychological and material problems in this period of his life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret Leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of a man’s private parts in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of a man’s private parts in a dream by Ibn Shaheen, because it is one of the most mysterious dreams in which the dreamer cannot understand the true meaning behind it, whether it is good or bad. Many interpreted dreams and related items. It is far from reality. Today, through the lines of our article, we will learn about the interpretation of dreams about blood that comes out of a man’s genital organs. The interpretation of dreams about blood that comes out of a man’s genital organs is considered one of the most searched for interpretations and at the top of search engines, and it should be noted that blood in a form A year of things that put pressure on a person and make him feel very stressed. The parts are interpreted as follows: If the dreamer sees blood flowing from his organs, this is a sign that he has committed many immoral acts and sins that displease God Almighty, and therefore he must work to get closer to God Almighty. The blood that comes out of a man’s vagina in a dream is a sign of His forbidden actions, but in the end he feels extremely guilty and will stop doing that and repent to God Almighty in the near future. It is one of the dreamer’s unpleasant dreams, as it indicates the many problems and crises that he will face in the coming period of his life, which will greatly affect his psychological health and work life. associated with it. Finally, we find that the blood that comes out of a man’s private parts, especially if he is married, is an indication that the dreamer will face many obstacles in his marital life that will end in divorce. See also: Interpretation of dreams about attending the wedding of singles, Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail. Interpretation of dreams about blood that comes out of the genital organs. There are a lot of small details that fully affect the interpretation of dreams, so the interpretation of a dream depends on the social situation that the dreamer experienced, as well as the psychological situation associated with it in real life and in the dream. Next: Bleeding from the husband’s genitals is a sign of many obstacles and problems that she will face in her married life. From another point of view, it indicates that the married woman will hear unpleasant news in the near future, which will cause him some sadness and depression. If the blood that comes out From the private parts of a man in a dream about a married woman is menstrual blood, this is evidence of what will come to him in the form of an abundance of good and plentiful food, as it is likely that this money will be earned. Through the inheritance that he acquires. Finally, if the dreamer’s husband is suffering from poverty and distress, the dream indicates that his financial situation has improved significantly. See also: Interpretation of a dream of water flowing in a valley in a dream Al-Osaimi and its most important connotations. Dream interpretation of the blood that comes out of the girl’s genital organs. As for For an unmarried woman who has a dream like this, where she sees blood bleeding from a man’s private parts in her dream, this is one of the disturbing and stressful dreams for her, but scientists have come up with a suitable explanation for that. So its interpretation is as follows: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream and bleeding

title: What is the interpretation of seeing spoiled meat in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rotten meat by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing rotten meat in a dream It is evidence of death and also if it is raw and infected with disease. Seeing tender, rotten meat is a sign of unpleasant events. As for seeing rotten beef in a dream, it indicates illness. Seeing snake meat is an indication of money taken. From the enemy. A dream of seeing pork and forbidden meat is a sign of forbidden money that the dreamer obtains. Interpretation of a dream about rotten meat according to Nablus. A person dreaming of seeing a lamb in a dream and skinning it is evidence of communicating with some unknown people. A person dreams of seeing seven meats. In a dream, this is evidence of obtaining a lot Of money. Eating camel meat in a dream is a sign that you will benefit from money. Beef meat in a dream indicates abundant wealth and good luck. Seeing rotten meat for individualsSeeing raw meat in a dream for a girl is a sign of profits that she will receive soon. Seeing rotten meat in A dream of an unmarried girl is a sign of the girl’s failure and inability to achieve goals. As for seeing rotten meat, it is a sign of an illness affecting the girl. A dream of seeing meat is for a married woman. A dream of seeing cooked meat in a dream is a sign that you will hear a lot of happy news. Seeing selling meat in a dream It indicates the divorce of this woman from her husband. But if she sees that she is cooking meat for her family in a dream, this indicates the happy life that she lives. Seeing rotten meat for pregnant women Seeing rotten meat in a pregnant woman’s dream is an undesirable dream, because it indicates unpleasant events. It may A pregnant woman who eats cooked meat in a dream indicates recovery from the disease she is suffering from. Interpretation of a dream about rotten meat for a man: Seeing I eat cooked meat in a dream is evidence of missing many opportunities for marriage and work as well. A single man who dreams that he is cutting meat, this indicates that he will soon marry someone A girl who suits him well. Eating roasted bird meat is evidence of abundant nutrition and goodness. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself carrying a gun in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of carrying a rifle in a dream for a single woman: The rifle is one of the weapons used in hunting. It is distinguished by its ability to reach and kill targets from a long distance. It is considered one of the most dangerous and deadly weapons if it is not used in the correct way. To help them understand the meaning and purpose of the dream, there are many interpretations of such dreams. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing carrying a weapon in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a weapon in a dream. The leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams said that a gun in a dream indicates safety, kindness, and comfort for the dreamer. Whoever dreams of buying a new weapon, this dream indicates that the dreamer He wants to protect himself from evil or from an enemy who wants evil and destruction (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). And whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a new pistol or revolver and bringing it home, then this dream shows the dreamer’s marriage to a beautiful woman of a moral and religious nature who protects him and his honor and dignity. God is the Most High, the Most Knowing. However, if the dreamer is married, then this dream indicates an extensive diet that protects him from evil and evil (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hunting rifle in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a hunting rifle and is happy with it, then this dream indicates The dreamer will suffer from accidents and problems in his life, but God will provide him with assistance against his enemies (). . God is the Most High, the Most Knowing). And whoever dreams in his dream that he buys a hunting rifle and hunts a bird or a dove with it, then this dream indicates that the dreamer is evil and attacks chaste women and speaks about them with lies and falsehoods. Evil (God is all-knowing). Interpretation of a dream about carrying a weapon in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is carrying a weapon and holding it, then this dream indicates his strength and ability and that he is a person of good character and religion. It declares that God, Blessed and Most High, supports him and guides him to the straight path and increases his sustenance with abundant wealth (and God knows best). Interpretation of the dream of seeing a single girl carrying a gun in a dream: Whoever sees in her dream that she is carrying a gun and feels happy and joyful, then this dream indicates victory and goodness for its owner. As a sign that God, Blessed and Almighty, will give her a good husband in the near future, and he will be her protector and her moral and religious commitment, and will raise her status. (And God is Most High and Most Knowing.) Interpretation of a dream about carrying a gun in a dream for a married woman: Carrying a gun on a married woman indicates great and widespread goodness for the woman having the vision and that God, the Blessed and Most High, will bless her with good children and offspring. It shows that in her home there is comfort, security, and favor from God, Blessed and Most High, and that God is Blessed and Most High. Her husband extends his help (and God knows best). Interpretation of a dream about carrying a gun in a dream for a pregnant woman. It is distinguished by its ability to reach and kill targets from a long distance. It is considered one of the most dangerous and deadly weapons if it is not used in the correct way. To help them understand the meaning and purpose of the dream, there are many interpretations of such dreams. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing carrying a weapon in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a weapon in a dream. The leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams said that a gun in a dream indicates safety, kindness, and comfort for the dreamer. title: Interpretation of seeing oil in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of oil in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq pointed out that seeing oil or natural gas in a dream indicates the differences and problems that the dreamer sees. Similarly, seeing natural gas in a dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety, but after a serious quarrel with love and life, and God knows best. If a person sees in his dream that he is swallowing oil, and its color and taste are wonderful, this means that the person is deceived by some of his friends. Interpretation of seeing oil in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is chasing gases, this indicates the collapse of differences and quarrels between her and one of her relatives. Likewise, seeing a tunnel in a dream with a person who is not accepted by anyone or unknown indicates marrying him as soon as possible, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that he is standing in a place full of oil, this indicates a lady of morals and a bad reputation in reality. Perhaps seeing oil in the life of an unmarried woman indicates the presence of an adulteress in her life, but she will repent to God Almighty and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing oil in a dream for a married woman If a married woman dreams that her husband is preparing oil and oil, this means that her husband will enter a new job. Seeing black oil in a dream indicates Also to the fears, problems and disputes that will arise in the coming period. Perhaps seeing oil in a married woman's dream and its color is white indicates her religion, happiness and the proximity of pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing oil in a dream for a man If a person dreams that he is arranging gas bottles in a dream, this indicates that they are arranged and stacked on the ground, God willing. Also, seeing oil in a man's dream indicates the ease of a man's life, from work to study to excellence in life and work. Seeing oil and its bad smell for a single man indicates his marriage to a paralyzed girl, and this is a dangerous coincidence and deception. When a man dreams that he is putting gasoline in the car, this is a sign of a lot of money that he will get. Interpretation of seeing oil in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees oil and its bad smell in her dream, this means that it will be difficult for her to give birth to a male child, and a defect occurs and the fetus is deformed, and God knows best. Also, seeing oil and gasoline in a pregnant woman's dream indicates many calamities, worries and problems that will arise, but you will be blessed by God Almighty. What is the interpretation of black oil in a dream? Seeing black oil coming out of the ground in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve many goals And desires. Also, the dream of black oil coming out of the sea is one of the dreams that indicates recovery from illness. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream The interpretation of the number 9 refers to many expressions and connotations that differ from one person to another, as the appearance of the number can indicate hope, prosperity, reconciliation, success, or even recovery, and seeing the number 9 in a dream has become an indicator of the fulfillment of all desires. It may be Interested in: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream has become one of the most common interpretations sought by many people, and this vision has been classified as very preferred. Therefore, we will explain the interpretations as follows: Seeing the number 9 in a dream is evidence that you have reached the highest stages of success and excellence. Seeing the number 9 in a dream is one of the numbers that indicates the dreamer’s recovery with this number, and this is in the case of the dreamer’s illness. Interpretation of the vision The number 9 in a dream expresses the fulfillment of the dreamer’s various desires. If you see the number 9 in a dream, this means that joy will come to you in the coming period. It also indicated that the dreamer commits many sins and disobedience. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 9 In a dream for a married woman: The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a married woman gives different interpretations, as follows: When a married woman sees the number 9 in her dream, this is evidence of pregnancy, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a married woman indicates that all her desires will definitely come true. It also showed that a married woman lives a luxurious life. But if she is suffering from problems in her life, then seeing the number indicates that she will get rid of all the problems that she faces in her entire life, and God knows best. If she sees this number and suffers from many problems or a lack of understanding between her and Her husband, this vision indicates the stability of her life with her husband. You may also be interested in: Pumpkins in a dream The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a single girl The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in an unmarried girl’s dream differed from that of a married woman, and here we mention this difference: When an unmarried girl sees the number 9 in a dream, this indicates her imminent marriage and God knows best. Also, the interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for one girl indicates that happy days are coming. The number is interpreted for individuals to fulfill the desires they want in the near future. You may also be interested in the following: I have seen My husband is getting married. The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretations of a pregnant woman differed from that of a married woman, and here we explain this difference: The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for a pregnant woman is an expression that she will get rid of the problems she faces during pregnancy, and God knows best. Also, seeing the number 9 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates That something is bothering her and she will get rid of it. The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream indicates that the pregnant woman will soon give birth to her fetus. The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for men. The interpretation of seeing the number 9 in a dream for men is completely different from the interpretation for women, and here we mention this difference and it has been included in the form Paragraphs: A

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: To see feces in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about feces for one woman, to see feces, indicates anxiety and confusion. Many people seek to interpret a dream about feces because they consider visions strange and disturbing, as they can indicate anxiety and confusion. We will interpret a dream about feces in a dream according to the interpretations of the greatest experts in dream interpretation, as defecation can be an indication of the collapse of worries and problems, and overcoming adversities and obstacles. And in relief after distress and paying off debts. Dreaming of feces in a dream for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing feces in a single woman’s dream indicates that she will get married, and God knows best. In other cases, seeing feces in a dream in a toilet is evidence of purity and chastity. Seeing feces in a public place or center indicates Shopping in a dream for a single girl indicates mistakes and sins. Seeing an unmarried woman defecating with difficulty in a dream indicates the problems and difficulties she faces. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is defecating in her clothes, this is evidence that she is spending money on worthless things. If a woman dreams If an unmarried woman sees a small child defecating on her, this is a sign of a good life and good news for her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing diarrhea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about feces for a single woman by Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi says that seeing feces on a woman’s skin is good and evidence of her marriage. If a single woman sees feces in her dream And she came out of a financial crisis, this vision is a sign of ease and abundance. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of loosening feces by Ibn Sirin: It was difficult to see feces in a dream, but she was finally able to relieve herself as a sign of changing the course of her life for the better. If An unmarried woman saw in her dream that she was sitting on the excrement of an animal, then this vision proves that she obtained a lot of money. See also: Interpretation of seeing urine in a dream according to Nabulsi. Seeing excrement by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing single people standing in the street is evidence of many sins and mistakes. If an unmarried woman dreams that she defecates in the sea or the Nile, this is a sign that she has a lot of money or a profitable business. Seeing a young man who cannot defecate means that you will face many problems, sorrows, and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream of feces in front of relatives. A dream of feces in front of relatives. There are many Meanings and interpretations of seeing feces or excrement in a dream. It may indicate the collapse of worries and anxiety and the acquisition of money, but it may indicate the opposite of worries and anxiety and their sins and disobedience, and this is according to insight and vision. Seeing feces in front of relatives may mean family problems and quarrels. Interpretation of a dream of feces in front of people and a dream of relieving oneself in a dream of the afflicted, the afflicted, and the debtor is a sign of... Freedom from worries and sorrows. Seeing feces in front of people indicates the psychological distress and danger that the dreamer faces, and Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that if he sees defecation in front of people in a dream, he will either say bad things, or it will be a scandal for him among the people. See defecation in front of people, which indicates revealing secrets that are shameful

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing poison in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing poison in a dream, many people see poison in their dreams and are afraid, but it is not necessary that seeing poison in a dream indicates bad, it can indicate good and there are many signs and interpretations about seeing poison in a dream and drinking it. The topic varies depending on the place, the person who drinks the poison, and the signs that appear after eating the poison, and here we will show you in detail an explanation and interpretation of the dream of eating or drinking poison. Stress and anxiety. Eating poison indicates exposure to dangers and sorrows. Poison in a dream indicates that money is prohibited. Poison indicates evil and the presence of enemies for the pioneer, and the healing of the sick and whoever drinks the poison means that he earns money and the young man must get married. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Whoever sees poison in a dreamdreams of seeing poison in a dream and whoever thinks that he is drinking poison and signs of swelling, infection and sores appear on him, this indicates that he will get On a lot of money, such as this infection and ulcer. Whoever thinks that he drank poison and died in a dream, this indicates good intentions. Whoever dreams of a large amount of poison or eating a large amount of poison, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money while drinking or eating poison. Poison in a dream indicates longevity, goodness, and worldly benefit. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing poison in a dream as money that benefits a person in this world. Interpretation of seeing poison in a dream: Whoever sees that he drinks poison will be released or get married. Dreaming of seeing poison in a dream Whoever dreams That he threw a bottle of poison away from him, this indicates his ability to overcome and control the difficult circumstances and trials that surround him. Whoever sees that he is killing his enemies and competitors with poison, this indicates a great victory over the problems that he may face in his life. If a person sees in his dream that he He recovers after eating poison, as this indicates victory and superiority after failure and pressure. He ate poison in a dream and nothing happened to the dreamer and he did not get sick. This indicates strength. Whoever sees in his dream that he is being poisoned with the intention of committing suicide, this indicates many psychological pressures that he suffers from, and the loss of hope and strength of the spirit to bear these pressures. Interpretations of evil when seeing poison in a dream. Whoever thinks in his dream that he drank poison and it did not appear to him. Signs of infection or ulcers, this indicates the sadness, grief, and distress that he is experiencing. Deadly poison in a dream is a sign of death. There are sayings and interpretations that poison in a dream is a sign of forbidden money. If a person sees himself drinking poison in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer A harmful person. Dreaming of seeing poison in a dream. Poison in a dream is anxiety and misfortune for the one who drinks it. Whoever sees himself poisoned in a dream, will fall into painful events. Seeing himself being killed by poison in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is poisoning those around him, this indicates aggressive and bad thoughts that he will convey. If one sees in his dream that his children or
